bibl.title: Euripides. Selected Fragmentary Plays. Volume II. Philoctetes, Alexandros (with Palamedes and Sisyphus), Oedipus, Andromeda, Hypsipyle, Antiope, Archelaus.
bibl.seg: COLLARD Christopher, Martin J. CROPP and John GIBERT (with Introductions, Translations and Commentaries by), Euripides. Selected Fragmentary Plays. Volume II. Philoctetes, Alexandros (with Palamedes and Sisyphus), Oedipus, Andromeda, Hypsipyle, Antiope, Archelaus.
C.R. par Rebecca Lämmle, MusHelv 62 (2005) p. 225. - Marsh McCall, Phoenix 61 (2007) pp. 356-359. - Monique Mund-Dopchie, AntCl 77 (2008) p. 353. - M. Wright, JHS 126 (2006) pp. 156-157.
